synopsis.text: Conan Edogawa and his friends, known as the Detective Boys, receive a homework assignment to interview a local business owner about their work and future plans. After considering several options, they decide to interview Richard Moore, a private detective, hoping to learn about his daily routine and gain insight into his profession. However, the initial interview does not yield much useful information. Wanting to find out more, the Detective Boys decide to secretly follow and observe Richard throughout his day. As they shadow the detective, the kids soon become embroiled in one of his cases involving a baffling kidnapping. Now Conan and his friends must assist Richard in unraveling the mystery behind the abduction while also completing their school assignment. Through this unexpected turn of events, the Detective Boys end up learning first-hand what a private investigator's job truly entails. Their school project becomes an exciting real-life adventure in detective work as the children collaborate to crack a convoluted case.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
